title: Luciano Pavarotti: Life in Seven Arias
description: The extraordinary documentary from the BBC tells the story of Luciano Pavarotti's remarkable career through the eyes of some of his colleagues and the arias that made him famous! With the use of extensive archival performance footage, interviews and film from the BBC, this documentary is an in-depth appreciation of the most popular opera singer of modern times. Interviews with Joan Sutherland, Placido Domingo, Jose Carreras, Montserrat CaballT, Juan Diego Florez, Renata Scotto and others. Highlighted arias from La BohFme, La Fille du RTgiment, L'Elisir d'Amore, Rigoletto, Tosca, Turandot as well as Panis Angelicus and Ingemisco. Additionally, extensive rare performance clips are included.
